title: Pip-Snake
description: Pip-Snake is a simple game where you control a growing snake that eats food and avoids crashing into itself.
author: @CodyTolene

meta.controls: Use any knobs to move clockwise and counter-clockwise, the front radio tuner button to restart, and the top torch button to exit the game.
meta.instructions: Move the snake to eat food and grow. The game ends when you crash into yourself.
meta.tip: The snake wraps around when it hits the edge of the screen.
